name: Paint Runner (Gwyrin)
description:
Introduction

This game is a submission for the JameGam#11. I made it in 4 days.

Find out the source code here : https://github.com/AudergonV/JameGame2021 (kinda messy)

Short description

In this platformer you can paint some platforms in 4 different colors. Each color gives the platform a special effect.

  • Blue : Speed
  • Green : Jump
  • Purple : Gravity
  • Red : Sticky

Controls

WASD : Move
W / Space : jump
D : Fall (When you're sticked somewhere)
Left click : Shoot
Right click : Change weapon

Credits

I made this game alone on Godot Mono 3.3

Enjoy!
